DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety ticlopidine + ginko biloba compare clopidogrel clopidogrel resistant patient undergo carotid artery stent placement . The investigator hypothesize ticlopidine + ginko biloba superior clopidogrel term post-stent ischemic lesion patient without serious complication .
DOC.brief_title: Clopidogrel Resistance Embolism Carotid Artery Stenting
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule stent implantation due carotid stenosis Patients resistant clopidogrel define platelet inhibition rate < 20 % measure Verify Now carotid stenting Patients informed consent Antiplatelet therapy aspirin , clopidogrel , ticlopidine Unable perform MRI scan Patients hematologic abnormality include neutrophil < 1500/ul , platelet < 100,000/uL , AST/ALT > 120 U/L Unsuitable participation
